message.body: I looked really good but he never responded
I'm surprised he has a picture phone
He has Internet on his phone he has for years
No not neat. His life sucks. I don't know why he doesn't quit his stupid job and follow me around. He clearly is madly in live with me
Bc he doesn't want to end up in kyles position?
And bc he's lazy and it's easy for him To feel Sorry for himself. Its so easy, the idea of improving his life just seems too Hard.
Bc guess what, living at the bottom sucks but it's easier than actually trying. Wanna see the nudey pic of me
Yeah I mean, ditto for Kyle I guess
So much easier to say I abandoned him bc I'm a cheater and never loved him, than to realize I had legit fears that many women will have
